meanings.definition: The presence of viruses in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with viraemia after finding viruses in their blood.
meanings.sent2: Viraemia can be detected through blood tests.
meanings.sent3: The viruses in the blood decided to throw a party, causing viraemia.
meanings.sent4: The viraemia in his bloodstream was like a storm of tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The viraemia spread through his veins like wildfire, infecting every corner of his body.

meanings.definition: The condition of having a high concentration of viruses in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: The viraemia in her system was so severe that she needed immediate treatment.
meanings.sent2: Severe viraemia can lead to serious health complications.
meanings.sent3: The viraemia in his blood seemed to be having a dance party, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: Her viraemia was like a crowded concert in her veins.
meanings.sent5: The viraemia pulsed through his bloodstream like a relentless army of invaders.
